rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Veranda
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance with a covered veranda reflecting the local aesthetics. The space is designed for welcoming guests and adhering to Vastu principles by ensuring an auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with Kerala-style flooring and intricate carpentry. Incorporates natural lighting and ventilation, aligning with Vastu's emphasis on the east for prosperity.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, offering ample space for meals and gatherings. Features a central dining table with traditional Kerala motifs.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Service Area
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional kitchen design integrating indigenous cooking styles with modern appliances. Adheres to Vastu guidelines for the placement of utilities.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room designed with Kerala-style woodwork and contemporary amenities. Located in an auspicious direction, ensuring calm energy for the occupant.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Sole guest bedroom with comfortable furnishings and traditional Kerala design elements. Designed to provide a homely atmosphere.

rooms.name: Bathroom & Toilet
rooms.description: Functional bathroom designed for personal use with modern fixtures and Kerala-style finishes. Vastu principles are observed in water placement.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with ergonomic design and natural light, ensuring productivity. Placed away from the bedroom for a balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment room with state-of-the-art audio-visual systems, designed in a cozy ambiance and integrated within the ground floor layout. Vastu guidelines ensure that leisure spaces are placed in areas of positive energy.

rooms.name: Service Courtyard
rooms.description: Open courtyard for additional living space, laundry and utility area. Incorporates water feature to enhance Vastu's element of water.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Traditional wooden doors leading into the veranda. The entrance is aligned to the north for positive energy flow, following Vastu principles.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Generously sized windows with lattice work to ensure natural ventilation and lighting. Openings are placed to maximize light from the east and west as per local design norms.

openings.name: Doorways
openings.description: Interior doorways that facilitate easy movement between rooms, designed with carved wood detailing.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool
additional_features.description: A modern swimming pool integrated into the landscape design of the property. While traditionally pools are placed in the south or west, care is taken to ensure balance as per local guidelines.

notes.text: This floor plan design adheres to both traditional Kerala architectural styles and Vastu principles. Adjustments might be necessary based on specific plot geometry and local building regulations.

The design incorporates sustainable practices by maximizing natural ventilation, lighting, and the use of locally sourced materials. It also addresses energy efficiency through strategic placement of spaces.
